comments.comments_text: Jonjo Shelvey (Newcastle Utd) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Newcastle.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Dwight Gayle (Newcastle Utd) volleys the ball from the edge of the box and it goes in off the bottom of the left post. DeAndre Yedlin provided the assist. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Paul Pogba showcases his great technique and produces a beautiful lofted cross into the box. Anthony Martial (Manchester United) meets the cross and gets himself onto the scoresheet with a header into the bottom left corner. It's 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) takes the corner kick and sends a lovely ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and knocks the ball to safety.
